tax_brackets.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1967'
tax_brackets.notes: The values here are an approximation of the 1967 tax system. The rates are the 1966 rates with a 10% rebate applied. This rebate was capped at $200, which is not modelled here. The top rate of 68% is from previous years and is assumed to be the maximum rate. The currency was decimalized in 1967, and the threshold is an assumption in dollars.

ietc.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2009).

wff.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2005).

ppl.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2002).

child_support.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 1991).

acc_levy.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1967'
acc_levy.notes: ACC scheme did not exist in this year.
